lines.text: Music is not something you can quit, you'll soon find that out.
Why does he have to write another Symphony? He's already made a Fourth, a Fifth, a Sixth, a Seventh, and an Eighth!
And this one will be his Ninth.
Where are the pens! I need a pen!
You should have thought of that before you destroyed the last one!
Music? There is no music! He just bangs away at his piano. There's so many broken strings, it looks like a bird's nest!
Where does he find these places?
My name is Schindler. Is Mr. Beethoven here?
You know you're not half bad when you keep a civil tongue to yourself.
You're all just a bunch of sissy-faced cowards!
You wanna make something of it?
